opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Discipline of Porro. No. D-2354

opinion:
538 U.S. 919

IN RE DISCIPLINE OF PORRO.
No. D-2354.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 24, 2003.

1

Alfred A. Porro, Jr., of Lewisburg, Pa., is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
